title: The Secret to Shopping in NYC
seo_title: The Secret to Shopping in NYC
seo_description: If shopping were a sport, New York City would be home to its Olympics and hall of fame.
short_description: If shopping were a sport, New York City would be home to its Olympics and hall of fame.
more_content:
Here, it couldn’t be easier to find your way to the top designer brands and best stores. What can be elusive, however, is the best deals. And that’s where things go a bit … underground. 

They’re called “sample sales,” and you’ll discover more than samples when you find one. Usually these sales are just a way for top designers to clear their shelves of the previous season’s product. These sales pop up in unexpected places and can be difficult to find: warehouse spaces, temporarily vacant retail spaces, even hotel conference spaces.

So, keep this between us, ok? Here are some sales coming up in March:
